articles_EN.title: International business experts awarded an decisive victory to Enecuum.

Could Crypto Mining Migrate to Smartphones?
Blockchain-platform Enecuum has a new adviser from Huawei
Mr Jorge Sebastiao, From Huawei, Joins Blockchain-Platform Enecuum As The New Adviser
Great news! We are glad to announce the new partnership with @hackenproof. To secure the Smart Contracts, Enecuum is hosting its Bounty program on their platform and gets #HackenProofed:

Enecuum, the first and only company in the world offering a blockchain platform with the capability of mobile mining, and Alphachain, one of the most prominent investment blockchain funds in the world, signed an agreement to create a strategic partnership.
